node_modules/pimatic-cron/README.md

pimatic cron plugin

Provides a clock module, so actions can be triggert at a specific time

Provided predicates

For example:

  • the predicate "Sep 12-13" is true on the 12th of october, 2013 from 0 to 23.59 o'clock
  • the predicate "friday 17:00" is true every friday at 5pm.
